hanzi-su-wiki:
準

Значения

Соответствовать; подражать, уподоблять, сравнивать; уровень, норма

Мнемоника

Ватерпас — прибор для проверки горизонтальности с пузырьком жидкости 氵, похожим на птичий 隹 глаз. Имеется также шкала на десять 十 делений.

Варианты

准, 凖

heisig_chinese_memo: At the turkey fighting semi-final, turkeys are injected with drugs via needles and splashed with water to help them last the match. It's standard procedure.
heisig_constituent: semi-, water, water droplets, water pistol, turkey, ten, needle
heisig_story: Think of this in terms of the semifinals of some sports competition. Water . . . turkeys . . . needle.

koohiiStory1: The anhinga, or water turkey, has a needle-like nose, so really it´s only a semi-turkey http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anhinga.
koohiiStory2: At the turkey fighting semi-final, turkeys are injected with drugs via needles and splashed with water to help them last the match.

jp_example_words:
基準(きじゅん): standard, basis, criteria, norm
準急(じゅんきゅう): local express (train slower than an express)
準じる(じゅんじる): to follow, to conform, to apply to
準ずる(じゅんずる): to apply correspondingly, to correspond to, to be proportionate to, to conform to
規準(きじゅん): standard, basis, criteria, norm
水準(すいじゅん): water level, level, standard
標準(ひょうじゅん): standard, level
準備(じゅんび): prepare
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Riding a tsunami you see a turkey carrying a cross, but that’s pretty standard here. This is your dreamland. You always dream about tsunamis and the turkeys carrying crosses that ride them. This might be strange for other people, but for you it’s pretty normal.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See this tsunami riding turkey in your mind. Hear it gobble loudly as it waves its cross around. Remember, this is standard fare for you. Nothing unusual here.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: These wacky dreams are only standard fare in June (じゅん) though. You don’t have them any other time of the year, just in June. You don’t know why June is the only time you have dreams about tsunami riding turkeys, but that’s just the way it is.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It’s usually pretty toasty in the month of June (in the Northern Hemisphere, at least) so imagine going to bed in this heat. Feel the spray of the refreshing tsunami water in your dream as the turkey continues to ride those tsunami waves with his cross.
Ru_Russian: стандарт, норма, равнение на что-то; неполнота, полу-
Ru_Meaning: semi-, correspond to, proportionate to, conform, imitate
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 准 (ジュン согласие, равнение на что-то; неполнота, условность, как бы) — кандзи похожи и значения пересекаются. 準 чаще используют в значении "стандарт, норма"; 准 в значении "ратификация"; оба в значениях "неполнота, полу-, квази-".

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the turkey fighting semi-final, turkeys are injected with drugs via needles and splashed with water to help them last the match. It's standard procedure.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " falcon ", the original meaning is water level. "Shuowen": "Ping Ye. From the water, the sound of the falcon." Duan Yucai's note: "It is said that the water is flat. The world is not equal to the water, and the level is accurate." ": "If you pay attention to it, you will be more accurate. If you are good for a long time, you will be peaceful."

" Quasi " can mean an ancient instrument for measuring the level. "Han Feizi‧ Youdu": "So the rope is straight but the wood is in vain, and the barbarian is quasi but the high-tech cut."

" Standard " can refer to standards and guidelines. "Xunzi ‧ Zhishi": "Cheng is the standard of things; the ritual is the standard of festival."

" Quasi " also refers to the nose. "Historical Records-The Benji of the Gaozu": "The Gaozu is a man, long and accurate, with a long face, beautiful beard and beard, and 72 sunspots on the left side." Sima Zhensuo faintly quoted Li Fei: "Quickness, nose. Changzhun, cover your nose high."

" Quasi " also means equal and equal. "Yi·XiCi": "Those who use the words also refer to what they are. The "Yi" is in accordance with the heaven and the earth, so it can fulfill the way of the heaven and the earth." Kong Yingdashu: "The "Yi" made by the sage is accurate with the heaven and the earth. "

" Quasi " also means comparison. "Han Feizi·Nan Er": "Accept the officials under the criminal name, and then the officials shall be judged by the measure."

" Quasi " also means to follow. "Han Shu·Criminal Law History": "Isn't the "Book" too clear? "Only the penalty is the shirt!" The review of it, and the ancient law, I will read it with all my heart."

" Quasi " also means accuracy. "Journey to the West" Chapter 10: "In the city of Chang'an, on Ximen Street, there is a Mr. Selling Gua, the most accurate one."

" Quasi " also means allowed, and " quasi " is often used today. "Two Moments Pai An Surprise" Volume 12: "Hui Weng approved him, mentioning his surname to an official."

" Quasi " can also mean certain and affirmation. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" Chapter 63: "Suspiciousness leads to dreams, and there is no evil... Don't say more, the lord, come early and act."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " falcon ", the original meaning is water level.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「隼」聲，本義為水之平。《說文》：「平也。从水，隼聲。」 段玉裁注：「謂水之平也。天下莫平於水，水平謂之準。」《周禮‧考工記‧輈人》：「輈注則利準，利準則久，和則安。」

　　「準」可表示古代測量水平的儀器。《韓非子‧有度》：「故繩直而枉木斲，準夷而高科削。」

　　「準」可指標準、準則。《荀子‧致仕》：「程者，物之準也；禮者，節之準也。」

　　「準」也指鼻子。《史記‧高祖本紀》：「高祖為人，隆準而龍顏，美須髯，左股有七十二黑子。」司馬貞索隱引李斐曰：「準，鼻也。始皇蜂目長準，蓋鼻高起。」

　　「準」也表示等齊、相當。《易‧繫辭上》：「辭也者，各指其所之，《易》與天地準，故能彌綸天地之道。」孔穎達疏：「言聖人作《易》與天地相準。」

　　「準」亦表示比較。《韓非子‧難二》：「以刑名收臣，以度量準下。」

　　「準」還表示依照。《漢書‧刑法志》：「《書》不云乎？『惟刑之恤哉！』其審核之，務準古法，朕將盡心覽焉。」

　　「準」也表示準確。《西游記》第10回：「長安城裏，西門街上，有個賣卦先生，算得最準。」

　　「準」還指允許，今常用「准」表示。《二刻拍案驚奇》卷十二：「晦翁準了他狀，提那大姓到官。」

　　「準」也可表示一定、肯定。《三國演義》第63回：「心疑則致夢，何凶之有……主公再勿多言，來早準行。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「隼」聲，本義為水之平。

準準RS rule, guideline, standard, aim
  • water 氵 level serves as a guideline for many 十 birds 隹
(Simplified: 准)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: To balance 十 water 氵 in a spirit level; 隹 provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 淮 [ huái ] a river in Anhui province
    • 十 [ shí ] ten, tenth; complete; perfect
①允許，許可：准許。准予。批准。
②依照，依據：准此處理。
③定平直的東西：水準。準繩。
④法則，可以做爲依據的：準則。標準。
⑤箭靶的中心：準的。
⑥正確：準確。準星。瞄準。
⑦一定，確實：準保。準定。
⑧鼻子：隆準(高鼻子)。
⑨和某類事物差不多，如同，類似：准尉。準平原。

準則 [ zhǔn zé ]: norm; standard; criterion

從「 水 」，「 隼 」聲，本義為水之平。《說文》：「平也。从水，隼聲。」 段玉裁注：「謂水之平也。天下莫平於水，水平謂之準。」《周禮‧考工記‧輈人》：「輈注則利準，利準則久，和則安。」 「 準 」可表示古代測量水平的儀器。《韓非子‧有度》：「故繩直而枉木斲，準夷而高科削。」 「 準 」可指標準、準則。《荀子‧致仕》：「程者，物之準也；禮者，節之準也。」 「 準 」也指鼻子。《史記‧高祖本紀》：「高祖為人，隆準而龍顏，美須髯，左股有七十二黑子。」司馬貞索隱引李斐曰：「準，鼻也。始皇蜂目長準，蓋鼻高起。」 「 準 」也表示等齊、相當。《易‧繫辭上》：「辭也者，各指其所之，《易》與天地準，故能彌綸天地之道。」孔穎達疏：「言聖人作《易》與天地相準。」 「 準 」亦表示比較。《韓非子‧難二》：「以刑名收臣，以度量準下。」 「 準 」還表示依照。《漢書‧刑法志》：「《書》不云乎？『惟刑之恤哉！』其審核之，務準古法，朕將盡心覽焉。」 「 準 」也表示準確。《西游記》第10回：「長安城裏，西門街上，有個賣卦先生，算得最準。」 「 準 」還指允許，今常用「 准 」表示。《二刻拍案驚奇》卷十二：「晦翁準了他狀，提那大姓到官。」 「 準 」也可表示一定、肯定。《三國演義》第63回：「心疑則致夢，何凶之有……主公再勿多言，來早準行。」

" Standard" can refer to standards and guidelines. "Xunzi ‧ Zhishi": "Cheng is the standard of things; the ritual is the standard of festival." " Quasi" also refers to the nose. Sima Zhensuo faintly quoted Li Fei: "Quickness, nose. Changzhun, cover your nose high." " Quasi" also means equal and equal. "Yi·XiCi": "Those who use the words also refer to what they are. 準字的基本解释

準
zhǔn
见“准”⑤、⑦。

準字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔn］
［《廣韻》之尹切，上準，章。］
亦作“凖1”。“綧1”的今字。
(1)水之平。
(2)指其它物体的平。
(3)古代测量水平的仪器。
(4)标准；准则。
(5)指使合乎标准。
(6)确定的主意、方式、规律等。
(7)符合；等齐；相当。
(8)衡量，比较。
(9)引申为揣度。
(10)瞄准；测定。
(11)见“準的”。
(12)依照；以为准绳。
(13)仿照；效法。
(14)抵偿；折兑。
(15)谓程度相近，可以看作一类。
(16)准确。
(17)准许；允许。
(18)一定；肯定。
(19)准人。古代狱官。
(20)鼻子。
(21)据以校定乐律（音高）的古乐器名。

準字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　準； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页639第24
【唐韻】【正韻】之允切【集韻】【韻會】主尹切，?肫上聲。【說文】平也。【前漢·律歷志】繩直生準。準者，所以揆平取正也。【書·立政】準人。【正義】準人，正法之人，謂士官。　又均也。【禮·月令】先定準直。【正義】謂輕重平均。　又【周禮·冬官考工記】權之然後準之。【註】謂準擊平正之也。　又平準，漢官名。武帝置平準官，籠天下鹽鐵。　又則也，倣也。【易·繫辭】易與天地準。　又樂器，漢京房所作，以定律數。　亦作准。【莊子·天道篇】平中準，大匠取法焉。【字林】準與準同。　又【唐韻】職悅切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】朱劣切，?音拙。【史記·高祖本紀】隆準而龍顏。【註】服虔曰：準，頰權也。文穎曰：準，鼻也。　又【集韻】數軌切【正韻】式軌切，?音水。亦平也。一曰車轅脊不停水。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記】準之，然後量之。【註】謂準擊平正之也。〕　謹按註係上句權之然後準之之註。謹將改準之然後量之句，改爲權之然後準之。

準字的起名意思

法则，标准；正确；一定，确实。

quasi-
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǔn］
[Yin cut in "Guang Yun", first quasi, chapter. ]
Also known as "凖1". The present character of "綧1".
(1) Water level.
(2) Refers to the level of other objects.
(3) An ancient instrument for measuring level.
(4) Standards; Guidelines.
(5) Instruct to comply with the standard.
(6) Determined ideas, methods, rules, etc.
(7) In line with; equal to; equivalent.
(8) Measure and compare.
(9) The extension is guessing.
(10) Aiming; measuring.
(11) See "quasi".
(12) According to; be the criterion.
(13) imitate; imitate.
(14) Compensation; discount.
(15) It is said that the degree is similar, which can be regarded as one kind.
(16) Accurate.
(17) Permit; allow.
(18) Certainly; definitely.
(19) Quasi-person. Ancient prison officer.
(20) Nose.
(21) The name of the ancient musical instrument based on which the rhythm (pitch) is adjusted.

quasi-
Name meaning
Laws, standards; correct; certain, indeed.
zhǔn, zhuó
вм. 准
Radicals: 氵, 隹, 十  (tsunami, turkey, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
Riding a tsunami you see a turkey carrying a cross, but that’s pretty standard here. This is your dreamland. You always dream about tsunamis and the turkeys carrying crosses that ride them. This might be strange for other people, but for you it’s pretty normal.
See this tsunami riding turkey in your mind. Hear it gobble loudly as it waves its cross around. Remember, this is standard fare for you. Nothing unusual here.
Reading Mnemonic
These wacky dreams are only standard fare in June (じゅん) though. You don’t have them any other time of the year, just in June. You don’t know why June is the only time you have dreams about tsunami riding turkeys, but that’s just the way it is.
It’s usually pretty toasty in the month of June (in the Northern Hemisphere, at least) so imagine going to bed in this heat. Feel the spray of the refreshing tsunami water in your dream as the turkey continues to ride those tsunami waves with his cross.

十 (десять), 汁 (суп), 隹 (старая птица)
Сравни: 准 (ジュン согласие, равнение на что-то; неполнота, условность, как бы) — кандзи похожи и значения пересекаются. 準 чаще используют в значении "стандарт, норма"; 准 в значении "ратификация"; оба в значениях "неполнота, полу-, квази-".
